newsitem.title: USA: IFR Systems introduces PCS service monitor.
newsitem.headline: IFR Systems introduces PCS service monitor.

text.p: IFR Systems Inc said Tuesday it will enter the Personal Communications Services (PCS) testing market with a communications service monitor.

IFR said its 1900 CSA monitor is a wireless electronic testing device for use by manufacturers of telephones and other communications devices. The product can be used to assure quality control for analog cellular and digital PCS applications, a company spokesman said.
IFR makes electronic test equipment for wireless and fiber optic communications, optical fibers and avionics.
Its shares were trading up 5/8 Tesday at 16-5/8.
